body_html:
I get a similar error but only after I call env.render() using openai gym after import torch. Prior to this it works fine. On the inverse if I render the environment and then import torch I get the error as well.

EDIT: So I 'resolved' this error by not running my program in ipython and instead directly from the terminal.
body_text:
I get a similar error but only after I call env.render() using openai gym after import torch. Prior to this it works fine. On the inverse if I render the environment and then import torch I get the error as well.
EDIT: So I 'resolved' this error by not running my program in ipython and instead directly from the terminal.
body:
I get a similar error but only after I call `env.render()` using openai gym after `import torch`. Prior to this it works fine. On the inverse if I render the environment and then `import torch` I get the error as well.

**EDIT:** So I 'resolved' this error by not running my program in ipython and instead directly from the terminal.
